projects.name: Frontend Mentor Projects
projects.desc: A catalog of all the completed solutions in Frontend Mentor. Using plain Vue.js, SCSS and data fetching from json.

projects.desc: A website to showcase all the projects created for The Odin Project. The parent project uses no framework, plain'ol HTML, CSS and JS

projects.desc: Landing page for Huddle. A platform to build communities and connections.

projects.name: Odin Library
projects.desc: A personal library for enthusiastic readers. Built with using dynamic content from vanilla JS and CSS

projects.desc: A signup page for 'Better Decor', an Interior Designing Company.

projects.name: Project Dashboard
projects.desc: A dashboard to share your projects with your collegues and friends
